title: YeetMind
subtitle: Welcome to our innovative product! A real time brain state monitoring tool to improve driver awareness.
Our primary goal is to increase road safety for all.

We implement several integrated solution including machine learning interfacing with hardware including a shock delivering braclet and commercial 4 channel EEG. We also integrated an RC car as a proxy for later integration with vehicles. This is served through a mobile friendly web application.
This was project was completed within 24 hours as part of HackED 2020.
